Try Scuba - Pool Dive
Experience the Thrill of Scuba Diving: Discover Scuba Diving Pool Dive
Dive into an unforgettable adventure with our Discover Scuba Diving Pool Dive. Perfect for beginners, this introductory session allows you to learn basic dive skills and experience the exhilaration of breathing underwater in a safe and controlled environment.
After a brief introduction to dive theory, you’ll head into the pool for skills practice and your first taste of scuba diving excitement. Led by our professional SSI instructors, the pool session lasts approximately 45 minutes, providing ample time to get comfortable with scuba equipment and underwater exploration.
All dive gear provided
Theory session to familiarize yourself with basic dive principles
Equipment session for setup and safety checks
Pool session for hands-on skills practice
Minimum age requirement: 8 years old
Completion of a basic medical questionnaire to ensure fitness for diving
Approximately 2 hours, including theory, equipment setup, and pool session.
Take the Next Step:
While the Discover Scuba Pool Dive doesn’t result in certification, it’s the perfect stepping stone to further dive adventures. Gain the confidence to participate in an introductory scuba dive in the stunning waters of the Whitsunday Islands. Our experienced instructors will ensure you’re ready to take the plunge and explore the underwater wonders that await.
Start Your Scuba Journey Today:
Got Questions? Give us a call.
5 Commerce Cl, Airlie Beach QLD 4802
Scuba Diving Day Trips
Master and Instructor Courses
© 2025 Whitsunday Dive Adventures

Beginner - Discover Scuba Diving
Embark on Your Scuba Diving Adventure with Our Discover Scuba Diving Day Tour
This ticket is for beginners who are not certified with a Dive License.
Begin the journey of a lifetime with our Discover Scuba Diving program, designed for those eager to explore the wonders of the underwater world for the first time. Under the expert guidance of our friendly and professional instructors, you’ll experience the thrill of breathing underwater and discover the magic of scuba diving in a safe and controlled environment.
During the Discover Scuba Diving day tour, you’ll:
Receive basic safety guidelines and skills instruction under the direct supervision of our experienced instructors.
Learn how to use scuba equipment and experience the ease of underwater breathing.
Practice essential scuba diving skills that you’ll use during every dive.
Enjoy swimming and exploring the underwater wonders of the Whitsunday Islands.
1 Instructor-led dive around the Whitsunday Islands.
All dive gear provided for your convenience.
Industry-leading 2:1 student to instructor ratio, ensuring personalized attention and guidance.
Dive time approximately 30 minutes (duration may vary based on air consumption).
Minimum age requirement: 12 years old.
Completion of a basic medical questionnaire to determine fitness for diving.
Enhance your day with lunch, available as an extra option catering to all dietary requirements.
Start Your Scuba Diving Adventure Today!
Embark on an unforgettable journey into the underwater realm with our Discover Scuba Diving day tour. Whether you’re a novice diver or curious adventurer, this program is the perfect introduction to the endless possibilities of scuba diving. Book now and take the first step towards a lifetime of underwater exploration!
Got Questions? Give us a call.
5 Commerce Cl, Airlie Beach QLD 4802
Scuba Diving Day Trips
Master and Instructor Courses
© 2025 Whitsunday Dive Adventures

name: Airlie Beach Day Tour With 2 Dives
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Airlie Beach Day Tour With 2 Dives ===
PADI Open Water Dive Course
Try Scuba – Pool Dive
Discover Scuba Diving – Day Tour
Advanced Scuba Diving Courses
PADI Advanced Open Water Diver
PADI Enriched Air Nitrox Diver Course
PADI Rescue Diver Course
PADI Deep Diver Specialty Course
Master And Instructor Courses
Whitsunday Islands – Private Charters
Pool – Refresher Program
Airlie Beach  Day Tour With 2 Dives
This ticket is for certified divers with a current Dive License.
Experience the beauty of the Whitsunday Islands’ underwater world, featuring stunning coral reefs, soft and hard corals, and an abundance of marine life. Keep your eyes peeled for sightings of grouper, sea turtles, and if you’re lucky, white tip reef sharks, adding an element of excitement to your dive adventure.
Dive into the depths of the Whitsunday Islands with two expertly guided dives, offering a glimpse into the breathtaking underwater world teeming with life.
All Dive Gear Provided:
Dive with confidence using our top-of-the-line dive gear, meticulously maintained for your safety and comfort.
Enjoy approximately 45-60 minutes underwater per dive, allowing ample time to explore the vibrant coral reefs and encounter fascinating marine species.
Explore depths ranging from 5 to 18 meters, providing diverse diving experiences suitable for divers of all skill levels.
Experience varying visibility ranging from 3 to 20 meters, influenced by weather conditions, tides, and the intriguing mysteries of the Whitsunday Islands.
Must hold an Open Water certification or higher to participate in the tour.
Participants must be at least 12 years old to join the dive expedition.
Complete a basic medical questionnaire available on our website to ensure you are fit to dive safely.
Dive under the guidance of our experienced skipper and instructor, ensuring a safe and enjoyable dive experience for all participants.
Cruise at a comfortable speed of approximately 22 knots, with the capability of reaching a top speed of 30 knots for efficient travel to dive sites.
Limited to a maximum of 8 divers per tour, ensuring personalized attention and a memorable diving experience.
Enhance your dive excursion with a delicious onboard lunch, available as an extra option catering to all dietary requirements. Check it out!
Got Questions? Give us a call.
5 Commerce Cl, Airlie Beach QLD 4802
Scuba Diving Day Trips
Master and Instructor Courses
© 2025 Whitsunday Dive Adventures
